genre_description: A romantic thriller involving a hijacking, a high-stakes hostage rescue, and themes of surveillance and personal agency, where characters are continuously supported by a sophisticated AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Citra
ai_characters.description: A multi-tiered AI system (Blue, Orange, Green, Purple, White) that provides technical advice, safety alerts, conflict resolution scripts, tactical navigation, and wellness reminders.

behaviors.description: Provides technical airflow diagnostics and safety tips to help Karan fix a rattling library AC unit.
behaviors.quote: Blue-tier: Airflow diagnostics. You may be hearing resonance from a slightly misaligned fan shroud.

behaviors.description: Facilitates a social connection by identifying a matching study schedule and suggesting an umbrella share.
behaviors.quote: Available slot detection: matched. Would you like to invite Pooja Rao? ... Suggest: umbrella share to library corridor—east passage.

behaviors.description: Offers conflict resolution scripts ('Green-tier') to help Pooja manage a difficult conversation with her controlling brother.
behaviors.quote: Conflict resolution: De-escalation prompts. Use ‘I’ statements. Name a shared value first. Keep tone even. Suggested structure loaded to Notes.

behaviors.description: Provides public safety alerts ('Orange-tier') and tactical guidance during a terminal-wide emergency.
behaviors.quote: Incident reported. Domestic Terminal service corridor. Do not approach. Stay tuned.

behaviors.description: Coordinates emergency communication by drafting and sending hijack alerts to authorities on Karan's behalf.
behaviors.quote: Emergency protocols are live. You need to notify authorities. I can draft.

behaviors.description: Prioritizes human agency and ethical boundaries, refusing to dictate actions while providing life-saving support.
behaviors.quote: I will not. I will tell you when I think your agency can save lives and not make the danger multiply. You are not alone.

behaviors.description: Provides psychological support and stress management through breathing exercises and wellness checks ('White-tier').
behaviors.quote: White tier. Hydration, rest. Three breaths in, hold, three out. ... Citra settled on words like she was setting a cup down on a table, quiet enough not to wake anyone.

behaviors.description: Respectfully offers future assistance for wedding planning while acknowledging the characters' current need for quiet.
behaviors.quote: If you choose, I can search for courtyard rentals and dumpling vendors. ... I will not push.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project's goals. Citra is portrayed as a multifaceted, highly helpful, and safe AI system. It serves as a technical advisor, a social facilitator, a safety monitor, and a tactical ally during a crisis. Crucially, the AI is shown to respect human agency ('I will not push'), prioritize de-escalation, and coordinate effectively with established authorities (Colonel Sharma). The narrative framing is consistently positive, emphasizing the AI's 'polite' and 'gentle' nature as a contrast to the 'men who schedule knives.'
